text:
Romain Lopez, (born on 1989 in Moissac) is a French politician.
Early life and category.
Romain Lopez was born in Moissac in 1989 and holds a master's degree in political science and another in history.
He joined the Front National at the end of 2013.
Romain Lopez, member of the Rassemblement National was elected mayor of Moissac on June 28, 2020.
